name: Fomo3D
description: In CryptoKitties, users collect and breed oh-so-adorable creatures that we call CryptoKitties! Each kitty has a unique genome that defines its appearance and traits. Players can breed their kitties to create new furry friends and unlock rare cattributes.

name: PoWH 3D
description: Etheremon is a decentralized application built on the Ethereum network. Etheremon creates a world of monsters (or Mons) where you can capture, train, transform, and trade them with others. You can also send your Mons to explore the world and battle with others players to collect amazing rewards.

name: Etheremon
description: Etheremon is a decentralized application built on the Ethereum network. name: IDEX
description: IDEX is a decentralized exchange for trading Ethereum (ERC-20) tokens. IDEX combines the speed of centralization with the security of blockchain settlement.
